Html:
Hi all,

I am new to nAudio library. I was wondering whether is it possible to use this component in asp.net application so that it can record and play-back the audio in the internet/intranet environment. Any hint is highly appreciated.

Thanks a lot.

Regards,

Milan G

Hi Milan

I think what you are trying to achieve is for the user to record audio on the client side. This is not possible without some kind of browser plugin. I think Flash can do this. For .NET you will need to wait for Silverlight 4.

Mark

Hello Mark,

 

how can you realise it with Silverlight 4 ?

can you may be give me a Tipp, i whant to realise a waveplayer for a project.

Thank you

you'll have to go to silverlight.net and see if you can find any demos. I haven't had the chance to experiment with Silverlight 4 yet

Mark
